title: Basement for rent in Highlands Ranch
posting_body: Whole Basement for rent in nice highlands ranch home.
Garden Level Studio Unit fully furnished.
About 600 sq ft. Nice bright and quiet.
FURNISHED W/ Queen bed with desk and tv in unit.
Looking for someone quiet who DOES NOT work from home often or travels.
Private Bath, spa like all renovated.
Not a full kitchen but nice new refig and microwave.
Not wanting to share full kitchen in house.
One parking spot, no loud or ran down vehicles.
Please call or text if no answer to discuss if this is the right fit and to apply.
